name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend system development, specializing in high-performance APIs and scalable services. Proficient in **Python 3** and **FastAPI**, with a strong foundation in database management using **PostgreSQL**, **ScyllaDB**, and **Redis**. Experienced in message brokering with **RabbitMQ**, **Apache Kafka**, and **Google Pub/Sub**, as well as handling data analysis via **Google BigQuery**. Highly skilled in deploying applications on **Google Cloud Platform (GCP)** and creating cloud-native architectures. Versatile in designing and implementing automation tools and AI/ML pipelines, with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions for industry leaders like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python 3** with **FastAPI** to engineer backend services, streamlining document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Designed and implemented event-driven solutions leveraging **Celery** and **Redis** for managing asynchronous processing of over **1,000** financial transaction requests daily.
Deployed and maintained **microservices** on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** to ensure seamless infrastructure management as code, with an uptime of **99.9%**.
Developed and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, facilitating timely and accurate processing of over **500** data transactions per hour.
Led security assessments and successfully integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to establish robust and scalable user authentication systems for **10,000+** users.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve system integration challenges, ensure compliance with regulations, and oversee release strategies, improving deployment efficiency by **25%**.

• Developed scalable backend systems using **Python 3** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and enhance complex reporting processes.
• Engineered event-driven microservices employing **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing of **financial data** and transaction requests, achieving processing speed improvements by **30%**.
• Orchestrated the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, resulting in consistent and scalable environments across **15+** deployments.
• Constructed robust data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, streamlining data flow by **40%** through task automation.
• Conducted thorough security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to effectively manage authentication and enhance access controls for over **2,000** users.
• Actively collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration, adherence to regulatory compliance, and successful management of releases, maintaining a **95%** success rate in deployments.

Utilized **Python 3** to develop backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, enhancing trading operations and increasing processing efficiency by **25%**.
Engineered real-time price feed processors with **Redis**, **asyncio**, and **WebSockets** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, achieving latency reductions of up to **15ms**.
Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring seamless user interaction with the platform and a **30%** reduction in response time.
Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols to maintain compliance and data integrity.
Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes, which improved development cycles by **20%**.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management for efficiency and reliability.
Leveraged **Google Cloud Platform**, including **Google BigQuery** for data analysis and **ScyllaDB** for high throughput, ensuring the platform scales effectively with user demand.
